/**
 * Construct custom filter param, for example buildConfigName.
 *
 * @param attribute - Filter attribute containing for example operator
 * @param value - Original filter value
 * @returns Adjusted filter value based on filter attribute
 */export var constructCustomFilterParam=function constructCustomFilterParam(attribute,value){if(attribute.operator==='=like='){var isNegated=false;// when negated: convert !ab?c to ab?c
if(value.startsWith('!')){isNegated=true;value=value.substring(1);}// convert abc to %abc%
value='%'+value+'%';// when negated: convert %ab_c% to !%ab_c%
if(isNegated){value='!'+value;}return value;}throw new Error("".concat(attribute.operator," is not supported when creating custom filter param."));};
